***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The Conjurer specialises in the violent and destructive magic of conjuration spells. Like Wizards, the Conjurer starts with the Magic Dart spell, in their case from a library of destructive conjurations. |

**Conjurers** are offensive spellcasters who specialize in violent and volatile non-elemental [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"). Relative to other magical backgrounds, they begin the game with a great Conjurations skill, and the most Intelligence of any background.

## Contents

- [1 Preferred Species](#Preferred_Species)
- [2 Starting Equipment](#Starting_Equipment)
- [3 Starting Skills and Stats](#Starting_Skills_and_Stats)
- [4 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [4.1 Spell Details](#Spell_Details)
- [5 History](#History)

## Preferred Species

[Deep Elf](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf"), [Naga](/Naga "Naga"), [Tengu](/Tengu "Tengu"), [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian"), [Djinni](/Djinni "Djinni"), and [Demigod](/Demigod "Demigod") are the recommended species if you pick a Conjurer Background.

## Starting Equipment

Some [species](/Species "Species") may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.

- +0 [robe](/Robe "Robe")
- [Potion of magic](/Potion_of_magic "Potion of magic")

**Available Spells:**

- [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart")
- [Searing Ray](/Searing_Ray "Searing Ray")
- [Fulminant Prism](/Fulminant_Prism "Fulminant Prism")
- [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast")

Conjurers start with the [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") spell already memorised.

## Starting Skills and Stats

These are adjusted by your species' [aptitudes](/Aptitude "Aptitude").

- [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging"): 2
- [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth"): 2
- [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting"): 2
- [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"): 4

Choosing Conjurer adds 10 to your starting [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence"), 3 to your starting [Dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity"), but reduces starting [Strength](/Strength "Strength") by 1.

## Strategy

The Conjurer starting book contains a variety of pure [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") attack spells. Once they get to [XL](/XL "XL") 2, Conjurers receive a variety of strong, reliable, and irresistible spells to inflict damage on their foes. This puts them in stark contrast to elementalists and Alchemists, who may face enemies that resist their spells.

The Conjurations skill is very flexible; contributing to the power and failure of many elemental spells, if/when you get them.

### Spell Details

Conjurers have access to [Searing Ray](/Searing_Ray "Searing Ray") at XL2, a strong overall spell, if a bit plain. It can be recast for only 1 MP by waiting (pressing '.', also automatically done with autofight). Their starting spell, [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") is somewhat weaker. Magic Dart has a few benefits; it never misses and has a full-screen range.

Both [Fulminant Prism](/Fulminant_Prism "Fulminant Prism") and [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast") are very useful, though you should generally get Prism first (since it deals more damage). Prism creates a stationary summon; after 2 turns, it explodes in a 3×3 area. Against a 100% speed monster, you should put a prism one space ahead - but not in the direct path of - the monster. That way, you don't get hurt and the monster does.

Iskenderun's Mystic Blast is a support spell great for knocking enemies back, or damaging multiple enemies. Surrounded? Say no more; it's just as potent as, and more reliable than, [Blink](/Blink "Blink") for this purpose.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Conjurers also started with [Dazzling Flash](/Dazzling_Flash "Dazzling Flash").
- In 0.29, most backgrounds were buffed; all Mage backgrounds gained a [potion of magic](/Potion_of_magic "Potion of magic").
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Conjurers started with the [Book of Conjurations](/Book_of_Conjurations "Book of Conjurations"), which had the spells Conjurers do now.
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), their starting [stats](/Stat "Stat") were +6 Int / +4 Dex / +2 Str. They were swapped with the newly named [Hedge Wizard](/Hedge_Wizard "Hedge Wizard").
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), the [Book of Conjurations](/Book_of_Conjurations "Book of Conjurations") had [Dazzling Spray](/Dazzling_Spray "Dazzling Spray") instead of [Dazzling Flash](/Dazzling_Flash "Dazzling Flash") and also contained [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance").
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), the Book of Conjurations had [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere") instead of Force Lance.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), they started with 20 gold and 1 Spellcasting instead of 2.
- Prior to [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), their starting spell book included a variety of Ice/Air elemental spells, plus [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart").
- Prior to [0.9](/0.9 "0.9"), Conjurers could pick between a Fire/Earth and Ice/Air book; Conjurers now receive the latter, with the notable addition of [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud").

From CrawlWiki

Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The Conjurer specialises in the violent and destructive magic of conjuration spells. Like Wizards, the Conjurer starts with the Magic Dart spell, in their case from a library of destructive conjurations.

Conjurers are offensive spellcasters who specialize in violent and volatile non-elemental Conjurations. Relative to other magical backgrounds, they begin the game with a great Conjurations skill, and the most Intelligence of any background.

Contents

  • 1 Preferred Species
  • 2 Starting Equipment
  • 3 Starting Skills and Stats
  • 4 Strategy
    • 4.1 Spell Details
  • 5 History

Preferred Species

Deep Elf, Naga, Tengu, Draconian, Djinni, and Demigod are the recommended species if you pick a Conjurer Background.

Starting Equipment

Some species may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.

  • +0 robe
  • Potion of magic

Available Spells:

  • Magic Dart
  • Searing Ray
  • Fulminant Prism
  • Iskenderun's Mystic Blast

Conjurers start with the Magic Dart spell already memorised.

Starting Skills and Stats

These are adjusted by your species' aptitudes.

  • Dodging: 2
  • Stealth: 2
  • Spellcasting: 2
  • Conjurations: 4

Once they get to XL 2, Conjurers receive a variety of strong, reliable, and irresistible spells to inflict damage on their foes. This puts them in stark contrast to elementalists and Alchemists, who may face enemies that resist their spells.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, Conjurers also started with Dazzling Flash.
  • In 0.29, most backgrounds were buffed; all Mage backgrounds gained a potion of magic.
  • Prior to 0.27, Conjurers started with the Book of Conjurations, which had the spells Conjurers do now.
  • Prior to 0.26, their starting stats were +6 Int / +4 Dex / +2 Str. They were swapped with the newly named Hedge Wizard.
  • Prior to 0.25, the Book of Conjurations had Dazzling Spray instead of Dazzling Flash and also contained Force Lance.

  • Prior to 0.14, they started with 20 gold and 1 Spellcasting instead of 2.
  • Prior to 0.12, their starting spell book included a variety of Ice/Air elemental spells, plus Magic Dart.
  • Prior to 0.9, Conjurers could pick between a Fire/Earth and Ice/Air book; Conjurers now receive the latter, with the notable addition of Mephitic Cloud.
